Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2009 09:23PM bsOK wrote: I am a breast surgical oncologist and use the nomogram created by dr. kim van zee at memorial sloan-kettering cancer center. (Best institution for training, FYI)  search "memorial nomogram breast" and as long as you know the information regarding your cancer, you can see the % chance of having additional positive nodes.  This is an excellent tool I use with my patients.  Even better than the best breast surgeons predicting the %.
Posts.Title: Typographical Error on Pathology Report Britt Britt
